title: System Requierments
body:
1. Can i run lol on 1 GB ram, 251 VGA, Windows 7 ,
2.00 GHZ proccers intel core 2 duo

replies.body: As far as I can tell, you should be good to go. Be sure to check out our [**minimum specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements) page to check anything else you might need to!
